mapper.select: SELECT mc_no, mc_nm, mc_company_no, mc_main_nm, mc_addr, mc_main_image, mc_email, mc_pw, mc_tel, mc_introduce, sessionkey, regdate, updatedate FROM makeup_company

SELECT * FROM (SELECT CEIL (rownum / 10) page, sc.mc_no, sc.mc_nm, sc.mc_company_no, sc.mc_main_nm, sc.mc_addr, sc.mc_main_image, sc.mc_email, sc.mc_pw, sc.mc_tel, sc.mc_smy_intro, sc.mc_introduce, sc.sessionkey, sc.regdate, sc.updatedate ROUND((SELECT AVG(sr.mr_point) FROM makeup.review sr WHERE sr.mc_no = sc.mc_no), 1) avg, (SELECT count(*) FROM makeup_review sr WHERE sr.mc_no = sc.mc_no) count FROM (SELECT * FROM studio_company order by mc_no desc) sc) WHERE page = #{page}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, sc.mc_no, sc.mc_nm, sc.mc_company_no, sc.mc_main_nm, sc.mc_addr, sc.mc_main_image, sc.mc_email, sc.mc_pw, sc.mc_tel, sc.mc_smy_intro, sc.mc_introduce, sc.sessionkey, sc.regdate, sc.updatedate ROUND((SELECT AVG(sr.mr_point) FROM makeup.review sr WHERE sr.mc_no = sc.mc_no), 1) avg, (SELECT count(*) FROM makeup_review sr WHERE sr.mc_no = sc.mc_no) count FROM makeup_company sc WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} and sc.mc_no > 0 order by sc.mc_no DESC ) where rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(mc_no) FROM makeup_company WHERE mc_no > 0

select * from ( SELECT rownum rn, sc.mc_no, sc.mc_nm, sc.mc_company_no, sc.mc_main_nm, sc.mc_addr, sc.mc_main_image, sc.mc_email, sc.mc_pw, sc.mc_tel, sc.mc_smy_intro, sc.mc_introduce, sc.sessionkey, sc.regdate, sc.updatedate, ROUND((SELECT AVG(sr.mr_point) FROM makeup_review sr WHERE sr.mc_no = sc.mc_no), 1) avg, (SELECT count(*) FROM makeup_review sr WHERE sr.mc_no = sc.mc_no) count FROM makeup_company sc where 1=1
and rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} and mc_no > 0 order by mc_no DESC ) where rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum}
select count(mc_no) from makeup_company where mc_no > 0
SELECT mc_no, mc_nm, mc_company_no, mc_main_nm, mc_addr, mc_main_image, mc_email, mc_tel, mc_introduce, mc_smy_intro FROM makeup_company WHERE mc_no = #{mc_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO makeup_review (mr_no, mc_no, mr_content, mr_point, regdate, updatedate) VALUES (makeup_review_seq.nextval, #{mc_no}, #{mr_content}, #{mr_point}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT mr_no, mc_no, mr_content, mr_point, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY-MM-DD') AS regdate, updatedate FROM makeup_review WHERE mc_no = #{mc_no} ORDER BY mr_no DESC
SELECT ROUND(AVG(mr_point), 1) AS avg FROM makeup_review WHERE mc_no = #{mc_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM makeup_review WHERE mc_no = #{mc_no}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS countProduct FROM makeup_product JOIN makeup_company USING(mc_no) WHERE mc_no = #{mc_no}
